title: Chilled Tofu with Avocado
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - 4 pieces shiso or perilla leaf, thinly sliced
directions: 1. Open the tofu package and drain any excess water. Cover the tofu with paper towels and invert onto the towels for a few minutes to absorb moisture.2. Remove the paper towels and gently transfer the tofu in one piece to a serving plate.3. Slice the avocado lengthwise, keeping one end intact, and fan it out on top of the tofu.4. Drizzle the chili crisp vinaigrette over the tofu and avocado.5. Top with minced ginger, sliced shiso leaves, sesame seeds, and fried shallots.6. Serve immediately.
